title: 'Sweet Corn and Clever Rabbit' featuring Eris Baker
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In this playful tale with roots in Canada, Mexico and Costa Rica, Eris Baker (This Is Us) plays a tricky rabbit who presents her fellow animals with an offer they can't refuse.
